sentences.en: BTH had no direct inhibition to the spore germination and mycelial growth.
sentences.cn: BTH对 炭疽菌孢子萌发及菌丝生长均无直接抑制作用.

sentences.en: Don't flee battles just because they seem pointless to you. A horde of spore plants when you can shoot two targeted shots per round is still good xp!
sentences.cn: 不用逃避战斗，因为他们似乎对你无所谓。一大批孢子植物时，你可以各个击破它们并得到一些经验值！

sentences.en: Early fertile spore cabbage is a vegetable of leaflet coccus form.
sentences.cn: “早生子持”孢子甘蓝是一种以小叶球供食用的特菜.

sentences.en: Legionellae are aerobic, non - spore formingrod - shaped , typically flagellated, gram - negative bacteria.
sentences.cn: 军团菌群是一种好氧的 、 非 孢子繁殖的、杆状的 、 一般带有绒毛的格兰氏阴性菌.

sentences.en: Objectives To observe how cere spore bacilli resulted in swallowing infection.
sentences.cn: 目的:观察蜡样芽胞杆菌感染途径.

sentences.en: Results Cerea spore bacilli were detected from the bacterial cultivation.
sentences.cn: 结果:通过细菌学培养鉴定在咽部检出蜡样芽胞杆菌.

sentences.en: Salicylic acid (SA) has no inhibition in growth of hyphae, and no obvious influence on spore germination.
sentences.cn: 水杨酸对焦枯病菌菌丝的生长无抑制作用，对孢子萌发的影响不显著。

sentences.en: Spore characters of 23 acrocarpous moss taxa in China are reported.
sentences.cn: 报道了中国23种顶蒴藓类孢子的形态特征.

sentences.en: Spore Mines can no longer enter Ravener Tunnels and Webway Gates.
sentences.cn: 孢子雷不能进入坑道和传送门.

sentences.en: Sunkens and Spore Colonies will not expand the creep.
sentences.cn: 地刺和孢子菌落不会扩张菌毯.
这种阳离子能透入孢子.

sentences.en: The development process and spore sterile culture of Pteris wallichiana Agardh.
sentences.cn: 研究了西南凤尾蕨的发育过程和孢子的无菌培养方法.

sentences.en: The encroach process includes conglutination, spore germination, penetration, growth and host death.
sentences.cn: 它对寄主侵染过程包括粘附 、 子萌发 、 透虫体 、 内发育和致死.

sentences.en: The optimum temperature for fungus growth aud spore germination is 25 - 28℃.
sentences.cn: 病菌生长的适宜温度为25—28℃,在pH4.5—10之间均能生长,孢子萌发的适宜温度为25—28℃.

sentences.en: The same goes for spore diseases like anthrax, where it's in the soil -- "you can't get rid of that unless you concrete the entire world, because it's in the soil.
sentences.cn: 通过孢子传播的疾病情况也相同，例如炭疽病就存在于土壤中--“由于它存在于土壤中，除非把整个世界浇注上混凝土，不然无法根除炭疽病。”

sentences.en: The use of slide culture method compression rate of spore germination.
sentences.cn: 采用玻片压片培养法计算孢子萌发率.

sentences.en: Triterpenoids are the main efficacious ingredients in ganoderma spore lipids.
sentences.cn: 灵芝三萜类化合物是灵芝孢子油中的主要功效成分.

sentences.en: Zoospore An asexual motile spore produced by a zoosporangium.
sentences.cn: 游动孢子:由游动孢子囊产生的无性可自由运动的孢子.

words.tran_cn: 侧孢病霉；[医] 孢子丝菌病；分支孢菌病

trans.tran_cn: 孢子，胚种，（事物的）根源，原因
trans.tran_en: a cell like a seed that is produced by some plants such as  mushrooms  and can develop into a new plant
